title: Typography in music videos
content:
The most Amazing selection of music videos that uses animated typography. The art and technique of expression with kinetic text is used to communicate the mood of the performing artists such as Nina Simone, Cuartetodenos, Telepopmusic and many more...

[http://yuxt.com/artist/Typography\_in\_Music\_Videos](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108212749/http:/yuxt.com/artist/Typography_in_Music_Videos "http://yuxt.com/artist/Typography\_in\_Music\_Videos")

Select AUTOPLAY after clicking the first video and enjoy the shuffle that was bookmarked on Yuxt
author: vitaly
